tech.title: TECHNOLOGIES
tech.desc: AnewStyle glowing stone panels combine three interesting technologies. The connection of a thin layer of natural stone with side illumination of a light guide plate with uniform full-area light diffusion. This method of illumination allows for easy replacement of the light source if necessary.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.desc: Here you will find answers to frequently asked questions regarding installation, maintenance, and features of our panels.
faq.q1: I have a designer lamp, but the visible power cord bothers me. How do you solve this with your panels?
faq.a1: BASIC and DELUXE panels are designed for maximum design purity. Their depth hides the socket and power cord behind the panel. You simply hang it like a picture and plug it in – no visible cables.
faq.q2: Do I need to worry about the placement of the power source and cables during installation?
faq.a2: BASIC and DELUXE panels are designed for maximum simplicity. Just hang them on the wall like a picture and plug them into a socket. All components (including the socket) are hidden behind the panel.
faq.q3: LED lifespan is stated as 30-50,000 hours. But what happens when the LED lighting fades after years?
faq.a3: Our panels can be easily disassembled and repaired. In case of LED diode fading, components can be simply replaced. This is a major advantage over common, non-repairable LED lights.
faq.q4: Is it possible to order panels in custom sizes?
faq.a4: Definitely! We offer custom manufacturing. Contact us with your size requirements and we will prepare a non-binding price offer.
faq.q5: Are the panels suitable for humid environments (e.g., bathrooms)?
faq.a5: Our panels are moisture-resistant thanks to nano impregnation and can be installed in wellness areas or bathrooms, but we do not recommend them for direct contact with running water.
faq.q6: Can the panels be controlled remotely?
faq.a6: Yes, the Deluxe version is dimmable and can be controlled using the included RF remote control or mobile app (depending on the chosen version). The Slim version uses a classic switch and Basic is controlled by a touch switch.
faq.q7: Is panel impregnation necessary after installation?
faq.a7: The panels are treated with special nano impregnation from the factory, which protects them against moisture and facilitates cleaning.
faq.a8: Despite using natural stone, the panels are lightweight because they use ultra-thin veneers. The panels are easy to handle and hang on the wall. Their weight ranges from 14kg in the smallest SLIM version size L.
